message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to $140. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your perspective on the value of the product. I'm still looking for a price closer to $120. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
